body.name: Sweetcrispy Standing Desk with Pull Out Keyboard Tray-48 in Electric Standing Desk, Height Adjustable Stand Up Desk for Home Office, Sit Stand Desk Stable Computer Rising Desk, 2 Storage Hooks, Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Ergonomic Standing Desk】The perfect electric standing desk with keyboard to stay healthy, active, and productive while working from home. The ergonomic placement of the keyboard tray is designed to reduce strain on the eyes, neck, and hands.

【Multifunctional Height Adjustable Desk】A range of adjustable heights (28.7 to 46.4 inches), with LED display and three memory settings, ensures customized comfort. When an obstacle is detected during lifting, the stand up desk will automatically spring back to avoid collision or conflict.

【Added Keyboard Tray & Hooks】Our adjustable desk comes with a keyboard tray (23.6'' X 9.8'') that is smoothly pulled out on pre-installed rails, saving space and ensuring comfortable viewing and arm angles while typing. 2 hooks are designed on the side of the table to enjoy a larger and tidier office space.

【Spacious & Quiet Work Space】The sit stand desk has a smooth and rapid adjustment speed of 20mm/s and operates quietly with a noise level below 55db, suitable for home office. Two MDF wooden panels provide an ample workspace of 48 x 24 inches, offering a sturdy, eco-friendly working area.

【Easy Assembly & Customer Service】The included manual and installation video of the computer desk ensure a hassle-free assembly. Our customer service team is always available and please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

What is the adjustable height range of the stand up desk？ The adjustable height range is between 28.74 inches and 46.46 inches What is the size of the keyboard tray? -The length of the keyboard tray is 23.6 inches and the width is 9.8 inches. What is the width between the legs of the adjustable table? -The table leg width for size 48 inches is 30.7'', and for size 55 inches is 38.6''. How much weight can this standing desk hold? -With the strong metal bracket and sturdy wood panels, the electric table can support a maximum weight of 154 lbs. Is the tabletop made up of one board or two boards? The table top of this home office desk is made up of two boards, but according to the installation manual to splice, the desktop will be very flat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desk looks great! The best part was that the instructions were fantastic! Went together very easily and works as expected. I am so excited to work at this new desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So nice I bought it twice!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My husband bought me one of these for Christmas. And I loved it so much that I ordered a second one. It is fifty five inches across, making it the perfect size for up to three monitors and then some!I am 5'10" and this is the most comfortable standing desk. The buttons make for smooth transitions up and down and you can save desk height settings. I put a walking treadmill under my work desk and it's wide enough that I can simply scoot it to the side when finished. Both of my desk came from the same seller. And these were really easy yo assemble. I just need to figure out where to put all of my computer cords. Overall I give this a 5 out of 5!!!!!! It goes perfect I'm my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Value for sale price
reviews.reviewText: The motor works. It is a little rough but usable. The particle laminate board surface is thin so don't lift table by the top surface. It might just pop off. I put a label to remind me and my family. Other than that, it is stable and very usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poorly Designed Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the table works as advertised. The electric function works great, it ended up being a little small for my ultrawide monitor, but that's a me problem, so no stars were removed on that account. I did however have a big problem with the keyboard tray. I wanted a keyboard so that I can hide my keyboard and mouse under the table. However it's not wide enough to fit both my keyboard and my mouse on it. Also when it's tucked underneath the table, there's not enough room for my hand to be in there as well, as it touches the top of the table. I ended up just removing the keyboard tray all together, and put my keyboard and mouse on top of the table. With a few small changes, it would have been perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT desk for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous about buying this, one because it's a great price for the size, but it also doesn't have a ton of reviews yet but I am VERY glad I did.It was easy to put together (as long as you don't skim the instructions like I try to do) - Took less than an hour I think.It looks great and I like the hooks on the side. There is no gap between the two top boards. It's not the quietest standing desk but it's not loud either and it's about what I expect.Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase and would purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your Money
reviews.reviewText: The predrilled holes don't all line up on this unit. I finally got it put together. Two brackets were missing, but I figured it would still hold ok, as the table legs are sturdy. But this only rises on one side! I can't figure out what the issue is, you're supposed to be able to plug it in and have it go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No keyboard tray as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I specifically clicked the item that was supposed to come with a keyboard tray and there is no keyboard tray. I’ve already gotten most of it put together so not sure if I’m going to send it back yet. Disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: Desk was as described. Did receive a damaged one but the company promptly replaced it. Easy to assemble and the desk is what I was looking for. I would buy again.
